title: Need Some Help
body: I just recently started playing the game and I would like to change my move click to left click instead of right click, I've tried many things, and looked at different guides and none of them seemed to work.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, because this isn't an option available in-game, it's not a change we support or recommend, as it can break things if you try to do it manually.

Let me know if you have any questions.
